statusDesc.UNDERDOSED: Prescribed but below target dose — optimization opportunity
statusDesc.CONTRAINDICATED: Contraindicated based on current clinical data
blocker.CLINICAL_INERTIA: No identified blocker — Eligible to consider intensification
blockerTooltip.CLINICAL_INERTIA: No documented contraindication, data gap, or patient factor was found. If there is an undocumented reason, please add it below.
blockerTooltip.PA_DENIED: The insurance plan denied prior authorization for this medication. Consider generic alternatives, patient assistance programs, or appeal.
blockerTooltip.STEP_THERAPY_REQUIRED: The payer requires a trial of a lower-cost alternative before approving this medication.
blockerTooltip.COPAY_PROHIBITIVE: The patient's out-of-pocket cost exceeds what they can reasonably afford. Consider manufacturer assistance programs or generic alternatives.
blockerTooltip.FORMULARY_EXCLUDED: This medication is not on the patient's insurance formulary. Consider therapeutic alternatives on formulary.
blockerTooltip.DISCHARGE_MED_LOST: This medication was prescribed during hospitalization but was not continued at the outpatient visit. This is a care transition gap.
blockerTooltip.PERIOP_HOLD: This medication is appropriately held for a perioperative period. SGLT2i should be held 3 days before surgery and restarted when eating normally post-op.
